Package logic

package logic
The logic package contains the core business logic and utility functions for user interaction, clarification handling, and input recognition used throughout the application.

This package acts as the central point for implementing:

  • Clarification management between users
  • Email, username, and password recognition and validation
  • User interface status tracking
  • Search operations across questions and answers
  • Menu logic for user QA interaction

Class Summary:

  • ClarificationsManager – Manages creation, retrieval, and storage of user clarifications.
  • EmailRecognizer – Provides logic to identify or validate email addresses in text input.
  • PasswordRecognizer – Validates passwords and may contain logic for strength checks or formatting.
  • Result – A generic wrapper for operation results, typically includes success flags and messages.
  • SearchFunction – Implements search algorithms for filtering questions, answers, or users.
  • StatusData – Maintains global application state such as current user, selected question, or database helper instance.
  • UserNameRecognizer – Extracts or verifies usernames from text, likely used during login or message parsing.
  • UserQAMenu – Controls the QA-related user interface menu and user interactions.
This package is designed to separate business logic from UI and data models, ensuring modularity and reusability.
